Simulator.Name: PumaDyn8nm
Simulator.Description: A realistic simulation of the dynamics of a Puma 560 robot arm. The task in these datasets is to predict the angular accelaration of one of the robot arm's links. The inputs include angular positions, velocities and torques of the robot arm. This version has 8 inputs. http://www.cs.toronto.edu/~delve/data/pumadyn/desc.html Data has been scaled with: -1.8847 1.8847 -1.8836 1.8838 -1.8843 1.8846 -1.8846 1.8836 -1.8848 1.8841 -1.8845 1.8847 -0.5999 0.5998 -0.5999 0.5999
